Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates camera manipulations.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzViewAction::ActionType

The types of camera manipulations that this class can perform. The camera will be rotated, translated, or zoomed as appropriate with mouse movement.

Enumerator:
ORBIT_ACTION 

Orbit the camera (rotate on X, Y keeping the current center point)

ROTATE_ACTION 

Rotate the camera (rotate on X, Y)

BANK_ACTION 

Bank the camera (rotate on Z)

PAN_ACTION 

Pan the camera (translate on X, Y)

DOLLY_ACTION 

Dolly the camera (translate on X, Z)

ZOOM_D_ACTION 

Zoom the camera (dolly on Z)

ZOOM_F_ACTION 

Zoom the camera (changes focal length)
